'''''Christie's 20th-Century Books and Manuscripts 6 December 2002''''' is an auction catalogue from Christie's (London). Two Tolkien-related lots are included:
*Lot 26 (p. 20) - Quotes from and describes two letters to A.W. Riddle dated [[Letter to A.W. Riddle (10 January 1947)|10 January]] and [[Letter to A.W. Riddle (2 October 1947)|2 October]] [[1947]]. Two pages from the letters are reproduced in a photograph.
*Lot 29 (p. 21) - Quotes from and describes a letter to [[Letter to Carole Ward|Carole Ward dated 10 August 1964]].<ref>{{CG|C}}, pp. 312, 621</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=72330|articlename=20th-Century Books and Manuscripts. 2002|dated=|website=TB|accessed=2 January 2012}}</ref>
